Message:
Down in the dumps,
I wandered aimlessly until I felt
a firm clasp on my shoulder.
The only person who’d do that is...
I was right! It was Teacher...!

She was usually busy
teaching the other children,
but she still made time
to talk to me. But...

She’s a little—no,
a really strange person.
I’ve failed so many times,
yet she still treats me kindly...

“Hey, cheer up!
What’s with the long face?”

“I believe in you.
So, you can do it!”

There it is again...
her misplaced faith in me.
She really is strange.
